tactic: rewrite <- map_replace_def_ok_d with (m0 := predta_coacc_0 d d m) (x := true).
exceptions.exn: No such bound variable m0(possible names are: d, m, a and x).

original: intros d a. unfold increasing_app, lemd, predta_coacc. intros m. rewrite <- map_replace_def_ok_d with (m0 := predta_coacc_0 d d m) (x := true). apply map_replace_inc_d. apply predta_coacc_def_ok.
